items.name: Maralal Goat & Camel Dairy Farm
items.short_description: Kids can learn about camel and goat farming, participate in milking sessions, and even try fresh camel milk at this educational farm.
items.address: Off Maralal-Baragoi Road, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Ndoto Organic Veggie Patch
items.short_description: A hands-on experience for children to plant, water, and harvest organic vegetables, promoting sustainable farming practices.
items.address: Near Wamba Town, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Beehive Discovery
items.short_description: Explore the fascinating world of bees and honey production. Children can safely observe beehives and learn about their vital role in the ecosystem.
items.address: Laisamis Road, North of Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Kipsing Community Livestock Visit
items.short_description: A unique opportunity to visit a traditional Samburu boma, interact with local livestock (cattle, goats), and learn about pastoralist culture firsthand.
items.address: Kipsing Area, Samburu Central, Samburu County

items.name: Maralal Children's Cultural Center
items.short_description: An interactive museum celebrating Samburu traditions, art, and daily life through play, hands-on exhibits, and storytelling.
items.address: Maralal Town Center, Samburu County

items.name: Ewaso Ng'iro Wildlife Explorer Museum
items.short_description: Kids can discover the diverse wildlife of Samburu through engaging taxidermy exhibits, animal soundscapes, and habitat dioramas.
items.address: Near Samburu National Reserve Gate, Samburu County

items.name: Suguta Valley Prehistoric Kids Lab
items.short_description: A hands-on center where children become junior paleontologists, unearthing 'fossils' and learning about early human history and local geology.
items.address: West of Baragoi, near Suguta Valley, Samburu North, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Storytelling & Craft House
items.short_description: Children engage in traditional Samburu storytelling sessions and create their own crafts inspired by local artistry and natural materials.
items.address: Wamba Town, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Ewaso Ng'iro Eco-Science Lab
items.short_description: Interactive exhibits exploring water conservation, renewable energy for arid lands, and the delicate balance of the Samburu ecosystem.
items.address: Near Samburu County HQ, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Desert Life Discovery Center
items.short_description: Learn about the incredible adaptations of plants and animals to desert environments through engaging displays and hands-on experiments.
items.address: Archer's Post Road, Southern Samburu, Samburu County

items.name: Stars & Savanna Physics Zone
items.short_description: Discover basic physics concepts through fun, hands-on experiments demonstrating light, sound, and motion, inspired by the savanna landscape.
items.address: Maralal-Rumuruti Junction, Samburu West, Samburu County

items.name: Local Weather Watchers Station
items.short_description: Children can build simple weather instruments, track local climate patterns, and understand the impact of weather on community life.
items.address: Baragoi Town, Samburu North, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Dino-Safari Adventure
items.short_description: A themed park with life-sized dinosaur models hidden among savanna-like foliage, offering an exciting 'safari' experience to find them.
items.address: Outskirts of Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Prehistoric Riverbed Dig Site
items.short_description: Children become paleontologists, digging for 'dinosaur bones' in a specially designed sandpit, complete with tools and discovery guides.
items.address: Near Ewaso Ng'iro River, Southern Samburu, Samburu County

items.name: Volcanic Reptile Ridge
items.short_description: Explore a simulated prehistoric volcanic landscape featuring animatronic flying reptiles and early dinosaurs, linking to the region's geological past.
items.address: Wamba Hills, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Giants of the Savanna Trail
items.short_description: A captivating walking trail featuring large-scale dinosaur replicas, each with informative plaques about their species and a connection to modern wildlife.
items.address: West of Maralal, along the road to Lake Turkana, Samburu County

items.name: Maralal Mystical Mirage Show
items.short_description: A captivating live show featuring traditional magic tricks, grand illusions, and plenty of audience participation, bringing wonder to children.
items.address: Maralal Community Hall, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Desert Dust Conjurer's Tent
items.short_description: An intimate and enchanting magic experience in a traditional-style tent, where close-up magic and mind-bending illusions are performed.
items.address: Wamba Cultural Grounds, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Safari Sorcery
items.short_description: A unique magic show with a captivating wildlife theme, featuring tricks that seem to make animals appear and disappear, or objects transform.
items.address: Samburu National Reserve HQ Area, Samburu County

items.name: Baragoi Bewilderment Booth
items.short_description: A series of interactive magic stations where kids can learn simple tricks, solve magic puzzles, and watch short, engaging illusion acts.
items.address: Baragoi Market Square, Samburu North, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Starlight Observatory & Planetarium
items.short_description: A digital planetarium offering immersive shows about the universe, with special emphasis on constellations visible from Samburu's clear skies.
items.address: Maralal Education Center, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Ewaso Ng'iro Night Sky Dome
items.short_description: An inflatable dome planetarium that travels to schools, providing engaging shows about planets, galaxies, and celestial navigation.
items.address: (Mobile Location - based at Wamba Community Center), Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Desert Sky Storytelling & Star Gazing
items.short_description: A unique outdoor experience combining traditional Samburu star lore and storytelling with guided telescope observations of the pristine night sky.
items.address: Ol Doinyo Lengai Viewpoint, Samburu West, Samburu County

items.name: Milky Way Mini Lab
items.short_description: A small, interactive exhibit space where children can explore models of planets, experiment with light and shadows, and understand gravity.
items.address: Archer's Post Youth Center, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Wildlife Rescue & Petting Zoo
items.short_description: A sanctuary for rescued local wildlife, with a dedicated petting area for friendly domestic animals like goats and donkeys.
items.address: Off Maralal-Wamba Road, Samburu Central, Samburu County

items.name: Baby Bush Friends Nursery
items.short_description: A special area focused on orphaned or young native animals, offering children a chance to learn about their care and conservation.
items.address: Adjacent to Samburu National Reserve, near West Gate, Samburu County

items.name: Local Livestock Learning Center
items.short_description: An educational center where children can interact with various local farm animals, understanding their role in Samburu culture and economy.
items.address: Wamba Agricultural Showgrounds, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Reptile & Amphibian Haven
items.short_description: A safe and educational exhibit showcasing local snakes, lizards, tortoises, and amphibians, dispelling myths and promoting understanding.
items.address: Maralal Nature Park, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Legend of the Sacred Mountain Park
items.short_description: A park designed around Samburu myths and legends, featuring sculptures and interactive installations that narrate ancient tales.
items.address: Foot of Mt. Warges, near Wamba, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Ewaso Ng'iro Animal Tales Trail
items.short_description: A walking trail with stations where children can listen to recordings of animal fables and participate in themed games along the river.
items.address: Along Ewaso Ng'iro River banks, Southern Samburu, Samburu County

items.name: Maralal Elders' Wisdom Garden
items.short_description: A tranquil garden where local elders share traditional stories, proverbs, and songs under shaded trees, preserving oral heritage.
items.address: Maralal Public Library Grounds, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Stars & Ancestors Story Circle
items.short_description: An open-air storytelling circle, especially magical at sunset, focusing on Samburu creation stories and celestial myths under the vast sky.
items.address: Baragoi Cultural Boma, Samburu North, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Savanna Adventure Park
items.short_description: A mini-theme park with animal-themed rides, a small train, and a water play area designed to mimic a savanna oasis.
items.address: Maralal Town, Samburu County

items.name: Warrior's Training Ground Funland
items.short_description: An active play park with obstacle courses, climbing structures, and mock spear-throwing games, inspired by Samburu warrior traditions.
items.address: Wamba Youth Sports Complex, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: River Journey Splash Park
items.short_description: A small water park with slides, splash pads, and water cannons, offering a refreshing escape from the heat, themed around the Ewaso Ng'iro River.
items.address: Archer's Post Riverside Park, Southern Samburu, Samburu County

items.name: Bush Craft Kids Zone
items.short_description: A theme area focused on outdoor survival skills for kids, including safe fire-starting, shelter building, and tracking games.
items.address: Near Maralal Game Sanctuary, Samburu County

items.name: Maralal Mega Play Planet
items.short_description: A large indoor play center with multi-level climbing frames, slides, ball pits, and soft play areas for various age groups.
items.address: Maralal Mall, Maralal, Samburu County

items.name: Samburu Bounce House Bonanza
items.short_description: An indoor facility filled with inflatable bouncy castles, obstacle courses, and slides, perfect for energetic kids to jump and play.
items.address: Wamba Community Hall, Samburu East, Samburu County

items.name: Creative Craft Corner & Games Den
items.short_description: A quiet indoor space for creative arts and crafts, board games, and puzzles, offering a calm and stimulating alternative to active play.
items.address: Baragoi Youth & Culture Center, Samburu North, Samburu County

items.name: Little Explorers Soft Play Village
items.short_description: A dedicated soft play area for toddlers and younger children, featuring safe, padded structures, mini slides, and sensory play elements.
items.address: Archer's Post Family Centre, Samburu County
